Delete No text found "Thank you for rating the app!" You have already rated This is the sample file
Step 1: Select a Language Step 2: Capture and Translate 1. On the main screen, you\'ll see a button with a flag icon. Tap it. 2. Select the language you want to translate from (the language in the photo). 3. Choose the language you want to translate to (the language you want the text to be translated into).
1. Tap the camera icon on the main screen to open your device\'s camera. 2. Aim your camera at the text you want to translate. Make sure it\'s clear and well-lit. 3. Press the capture button (usually a circle or a camera icon) to take a photo.
4. Wait a moment while the app processes the image. 5. The translated text will appear on your screen. Please wait for the data processing...
Quit Want to close the app ? OK Thank you
